item.title: Samyak add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "But life is a battle: may we all be enabled to fight it well!" -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Samyak add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samyak add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The truth is not for all men but only for those who seek it." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samyak add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "I take no pride in hopeless longing; I wouldn't hold a stillborn aspiration. I'd want to have it, to make it, to live it." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samyak add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "To say "I love you" one must know first how to say the "I"." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samyak add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Reason can be fought with reason. How are you going to fight the unreasonable? The trouble with you, my dear, and with most people, is that you don’t have sufficient respect for the senseless. The senseless is the major factor in our lives. You have no chance if it is your enemy." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samyak add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "She knew that even pain can be confessed, but to confess happiness is to stand naked, delivered to the witness..." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Samyak add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "The voice of Love seemed to call to me, but it was a wrong number." -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: Samyak add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "Providence looks after all the chumps of this world, and personally, I'm all for it." -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: Samyak add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "To acquire the habit of reading is to construct for yourself a refuge from almost all the miseries of life." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Samyak add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "I do not confer praise or blame: I accept. I am the measure of all things. I am the center of the world." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Samyak add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "There's always one who loves and one who lets himself be loved." -- W. Somerset Maugham
